name: Spread Your Message
description:
Okay, so full disclosure: I was mad at Blizzard when I made this game.

I presented this game as my midterm project for my Game Art Pipeline class. It's a stealth puzzle game in which you play as a graffiti artist attempting to spread their ideals. but the streets are fraught with police officers and censorship. Avoid capture and proclaim your message to all! 

Models by Polygon Land and David Stenfors

Skybox by Kendall Weaver

All coding, environment design, and lighting done by me.
